alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 5:44PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong convective shower will impact portions of east central San Benito County through 600 PM PDT... At 543 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong storm 23 miles east of Ridgemark, or 26 miles southeast of Hollister, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central San Benito County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park
